food_co2 <- food_consumption %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  summarise(co2 = sum(co2_emmission)) %>% 
  slice_max(., 10, co2) %>% 
  arrange(co2) %>% 
  mutate(n = -4:5) %>% 
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(
    x = list(c(-10, 0, 0, -10)),
    y = list(c(n*4 - 1.4, n*2 - 0.7, n*2 + 0.7, n*4 + 1.4))
  ) %>% 
  unnest(cols = c(x, y))
